rfc.title: IDL Data Structure for the Radar Parameter Block
rfc.author: R.J.Barnes

summary.p: A description of the IDL data structure used to store the radar parameter block.

body.p: The Radar Parameter block is used throughout SuperDARN software to store the radar operating parameters. Within IDL a structure is used to store the parameter block.
A number of constants are used to define array limits
